Climate change is going to be a challenge, but this is just too alarmist. For example, the comparison is made between getting on a plane with a 1 in 20 chance of crashing, and going forward with a 1 in 20 chance of temperatures rising an average of 3C. THIS IS A FALSE ANALOGY. The global population will be far better equipped to deal with a 3C rise over 80 years than 300 passengers in a 5 second airline crash.

And then there are the interviews with a random selection of poor people who try to deal with environmental challenges that millions have done before them. 

Poor form, Economist!
To be fair, what would 3 degrees of cooling look like

You always show the shitholes on the global south who are suffering of the global warming, but it's not important because they will suffer anyway with or without global warming. Why you do not tell the advantages of the global warming - espessially in Canada and Russia? Siberia will become green and warm - that is excellent news! Just imagine the large plains of Siberia and Canada wich become new agroculture heaven.

This whole video is tosh, there is no climate science instead there is climate politicalisation where climate data is manipulated, hidden, cherry picked and misinterpreted all to give the answer the politicians want.
